name: Shadows of Kobalon (Not Linear Campaign)
description:
Hi, I'm making a not linear campaign, infact you can explore a complete space sector causing permanent changes. Features:

\- Dialogs like Mass Effect (player decisions affect the game play).

\- Possibility to control the hero in third person mode.

\- More than 20 different weapons.

\- Possibility to explore a complete sector rich of stars and planets (explorable planets and space stations).

\- Manage your spaceship and crew.

\- Research new technologies in the spaceship's laboratory.

\- Possibility to call reinforcements in-game from the spaceship (scientist too).

\- Possibility to establish colonies.

\- Permanent changes.

\- Time-pass system.

\- More, more and more!

Youtube video: [http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VvEN\_EDeFF4](<http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VvEN_EDeFF4>)
author: _ForgeUser4518168
